content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 48, "index": 28}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 60, "index": 32}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 34}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 43, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft polished_andesite, I first need to craft andesite. Andesite requires placing 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the diorite from slot 15 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 48, "index": 28}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 60, "index": 32}, {"type": "brown_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 34}, {"type": "yellow_concrete_powder", "quantity": 43, "index": 36}]

thought: Since the diorite has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the cobblestone to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the cobblestone to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1
